name: RHYTHM OF NATION FOUNDATION
briefDescription: In life, many thoughts are born in the course of a moment, an hour, a day. Some are dreams, some visions. Often, we are unable to distinguish between them. To some, they are the same; however, not all dreams are visions. Rhythm Of Nation (RON) is a vision turned dream. A vision that aims at inspiring the youth of our nation to embark a journey of responsibility.We focus on computer education for the underprivilaged & various youth activities.
